text:
Colette Maze (born 16 June 1914 in Paris) is a French pianist of classical music.
Life.
She studied at the École Normale de Musique de Paris with Alfred Cortot and Nadia Boulanger.
She was a piano teacher.
In 2017, she released her fourth album dedicated to Claude Debussy. It also has works by Federico Mompou, Astor Piazzolla, and Alberto Ginastera.

annotations.surface_form: École Normale de Musique de Paris
